idea-plugin.name: ChangeReminder
idea-plugin.description:
Predict the full set of files in the commit given only a part of it.
In other words, ChangeReminder predicts files which developer might have forgotten to modify or to add to VCS (currently only Git is supported).

It is easier to understand by example.
When you are committing a file (ExceptionHandler.java), the system knows which files are usually committed with this one and reminds you to add forgotten files (ExceptionHandlerTest.java, ExceptionHandlerFactory.java) to this commit or to modify them.

action.text: Show Files Related to Active Changelist
action.description: Show files related to active changelist

registryKey.description: Do not show files which have probability less than threshold in Related Files node in Local Changes.
